TestCase.name: testEmptyGroupKey_WithMoreThanOneAggCalls1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a1), COUNT(*) FROM T1) t
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyGroupKey_WithMoreThanOneAggCalls2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT SUM(a1), COUNT(*) FROM T1)

LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, d2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[EXISTS({ LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) LogicalProject(select=[a1]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) })]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyGroupKey_WithMoreThanOneAggCalls3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT SUM(a1), COUNT(*) FROM T1 WHERE 1=2)

LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, d2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[EXISTS({ LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) LogicalProject(select=[a1]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 2)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) })]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyGroupKey_WithOneAggCall1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT SUM(a1) FROM T1) t
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyGroupKey_WithOneAggCall2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T1)
LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyGroupKey_WithOneAggCall3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T1 WHERE 1=2)

LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, c2, d2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[EXISTS({ LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT()]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 2)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) })]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testPruneAuxGroupAggCall_WithFilter1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, c1 FROM (SELECT a1, b1, COUNT(c1) as c1, SUM(d1) as d1 FROM T1 GROUP BY a1, b1) t WHERE c1 > 10

LogicalProject(select=[a1, c1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 10)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c1=[COUNT($2)], d1=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])
LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], c1=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])

TestCase.name: testPruneAuxGroupAggCall_WithFilter2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c1, a1 FROM (SELECT a1, b1, COUNT(c1) as c1, SUM(d1) as d1 FROM T1 GROUP BY a1, b1) t WHERE c1 > 10

LogicalProject(select=[c1, a1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 10)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c1=[COUNT($2)], d1=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])
LogicalProject(select=[c1, a1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], c1=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])

TestCase.name: testPruneAuxGroupAggCall_WithoutFilter1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, c1 FROM (SELECT a1, b1, COUNT(c1) as c1, SUM(d1) as d1 FROM T1 GROUP BY a1, b1) t
LogicalProject(select=[a1, c1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c1=[COUNT($2)], d1=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], c1=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])

TestCase.name: testPruneAuxGroupAggCall_WithoutFilter2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c1, a1 FROM (SELECT a1, b1, COUNT(c1) as c1, SUM(d1) as d1 FROM T1 GROUP BY a1, b1) t
LogicalProject(select=[c1, a1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c1=[COUNT($2)], d1=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])
LogicalProject(select=[c1, a1]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], c1=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])

TestCase.name: testPruneRegularAggCall_WithFilter1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a2, b2, d2 FROM (SELECT a2, b2, COUNT(c2) as c2, SUM(d2) as d2 FROM T2 GROUP BY a2, b2) t WHERE d2 > 0

LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, d2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($3, 0)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c2=[COUNT($2)], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 0)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testPruneRegularAggCall_WithFilter2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b2, a2, d2 FROM (SELECT a2, b2, COUNT(c2) as c2, SUM(d2) as d2 FROM T2 GROUP BY a2, b2) t WHERE d2 > 0

LogicalProject(select=[b2, a2, d2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($3, 0)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c2=[COUNT($2)], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
LogicalProject(select=[b2, a2, d2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 0)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testPruneRegularAggCall_WithoutFilter1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a2, b2, d2 FROM (SELECT a2, b2, COUNT(c2) as c2, SUM(d2) as d2 FROM T2 GROUP BY a2, b2) t
LogicalProject(select=[a2, b2, d2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c2=[COUNT($2)], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testPruneRegularAggCall_WithoutFilter2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT b2, a2, d2 FROM (SELECT a2, b2, COUNT(c2) as c2, SUM(d2) as d2 FROM T2 GROUP BY a2, b2) t
LogicalProject(select=[b2, a2, d2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c2=[COUNT($2)], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
LogicalProject(select=[b2, a2, d2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

TestCase.name: testPruneRegularAggCall_WithoutFilter3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a2 as a, b2, d2 FROM (SELECT a2, b2, COUNT(c2) as c2, SUM(d2) as d2 FROM T2 GROUP BY a2, b2) t
LogicalProject(select=[a, b2, d2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], c2=[COUNT($2)], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
LogicalProject(select=[a, b2, d2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], d2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
